topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d86d563687236a4bf1d00#post_552d86d563687236a4bf1d00
This weekend I'm going to dedicate it to My Mom.

I'm going to clean the house, Make the Food, Ask if she would like to go somewhere like see a movie. 

I have done nothing to deserve her. So I want to make it up to her the best way I can.
I legit feel super terrible of how much of a giant Lint ball I am. No Dedication. No motivation.

All I do is sit around and eat sleep and shit. 

This movie also reminded me of her when she was doing all that work fixing the house. 

If you saw my old home before it went into foreclosure it was a mess and a run down looking house too. And She did so much to that house. We added a Deck and an upstairs and everything By ourselves.

And still to this day she still works, She works even when she has back pains. Hip Pains. 

And what do I do? Sit around like a fucking shit. I need to do something. _something_. 

This movie is perfect, And I will fight ANYONE who says otherwise. *Anyone*.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
